description: Winter's chill inspires a snowman's love for reading cozy, icy tales.
title: Chilly Chapters
n_1: Frosty opens a frost-covered book in a snow-laden park.
n_2: Blizzard peers over, curious about Frosty's choice.
c2_2: Share the frosty tales with me!
n_3: Together, they enjoy the icy adventures, laughing.
c2_3: Indeed, it's a flurry of fun!
n_4: As the sun sets, they're warmed by joyous tales.
